Trial_Design.evidence: This was a subgroup analysis of a multicentre randomized trial

Intervention.evidence: The MOABP group underwent mechanical bowel preparation, and took 2 g neomycin and 2 g metronidazole orally during the day before surgery. The NBP group did not undergo bowel preparation.

Number_Randomised.evidence: Among 217 patients undergoing right colectomy (106 in MOABP and 111 in NBP group)

Result_Outcome.evidence: SSI was detected in seven (7 per cent) and 10 (9 per cent) patients (odds ratio (OR) 0.71, 95 per cent c.i. 0.26 to 1.95; P = 0.510)
